p: These data strongly suggest that SARS-CoV-2 manipulates PHB signaling for its replication and/or host immune evasion. Coronavirus accessory proteins locate to many different cellular compartments, as do PHBs, and this may therefore be not entirely coincidental. In addition PHBs have been shown to directly interact with DNA and long noncoding RNAs [ 42, [63], [64], [65]], raising the possibility that they may also interact with viral RNAs.
